titleStmt.title: A patheticall perswasion to pray for publick peace: propounded in a sermon preached in the cathedrall church of Saint Paul, Octob. 2. 1642. By Matthew Griffith, rector of S. Mary Magdalens neer Old-Fishstreet, London.
titleStmt.author: Griffith, Matthew, 1599?-1665.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
